question: In android, mini activities are also known as?
In which of the following is the Android application Framework provided?
On which kernel is Android-based on
The services in android can be stopped using which of the following method?
What is an activity in android?
options: A single screen in an application with supporting java code
answer: A single screen in an application with supporting java code

question: What is manifest XML in android?
options: It has information about layout in an application
It has all the  information about an application
It has the information about activities in an application
answer: It has all the  information about an application
